ygData.subject: Re: A Review of Activation Functions in SharpNEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Colin, Great report! I was wondering though: if I am not mistaken RELUs (and I guess SRELUs) only have the tiny slope to avoid learning stagnation in deep
